title: FOUNDATION OF THE CHURCH
author: ISAAC TEMIDAYO
description: This book explores the spiritual and doctrinal foundations Christ laid for His Church.
summary: In this book, Isaac Temidayo examines the core truths upon which the Church of Christ is built. He lays emphasis on apostolic doctrine, the person of Jesus, and the unity of the Spirit.

title: GOD SEEKS JACOBS
author: ISAAC TEMIDAYO
description: God is not looking for perfect men, but yielded ones. He seeks those with Jacob’s heart.
summary: Isaac Temidayo unpacks the transformation journey of Jacob, showing how God refines and uses broken vessels. A call to surrender and become God's Israel.

title: LIKE CAIN OR LIKE ABEL
author: ISAAC TEMIDAYO
description: An in-depth look at the heart postures behind Cain and Abel’s offerings to God.
summary: The book explores the motivations and consequences of worship, obedience, and offering, drawing lessons from the contrasting paths of Cain and Abel.

title: NECESSITIES FOR STUDYING THE WORD
author: ISAAC TEMIDAYO
description: This book outlines the tools, mindset, and spiritual posture needed to study God’s Word effectively.
summary: Isaac Temidayo shares foundational principles for approaching Scripture with insight, reverence, and spiritual hunger. A resource for every serious disciple.

title: SAM THE SEER
author: ISAAC TEMIDAYO
description: A prophetic study of the life and calling of Samuel as a seer in Israel.
summary: Isaac Temidayo looks into Samuel's life—his consecration, prophetic ministry, and relevance today. A book for those called to discernment and vision.

title: THE BEAUTY OF THE NEW COVENANT
author: ISAAC TEMIDAYO
description: An exploration of the glory, grace, and promises of the New Covenant through Christ.
summary: This book unveils the superiority and spiritual blessings of the New Covenant, contrasting it with the Old. A must-read for those desiring deeper grace living.

title: THE CAMP BETHEL
author: ISAAC TEMIDAYO
description: A spiritual metaphor for divine encounters, growth, and worship spaces.
summary: Isaac Temidayo speaks about the significance of Bethel as a place of encounter and transformation, encouraging believers to establish Bethel altars in their hearts.

title: THE NEW AND LIVING WAY
author: ISAAC TEMIDAYO
description: A doctrinal exposition of the access believers have to God through Christ.
summary: This book explains the finished work of Christ and the invitation to walk the 'new and living way' by faith, intimacy, and holiness.
